title: All you need to know about NFTs
desc: Connie Ansaldi and Nicolas Balestrini, experts in NFTs and Blockchain, joined us in this webinar to answer all the important questions about Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs).

title: Great Talk: Leadership in agile teams
desc: We participated in the Great Talk 'Leadership in agile teams' of Great Place to Work® Argentina, where we talked about the importance of building a strong workspace culture in agile and dynamic teams.

title: New rules for banking in Latin America
desc: Join this webinar where our Managing Partner analyzes how banks are responding to Fintech and BigTech’s disruption in the financial market. Are they competition or allies?

title: How did Ceibo Digital succeed in getting its employees to build the company’s brand?
desc: Hernán Gutsztat, Ceibo’s Managing Partner, talks to Khris Olivero, GPTW consultant, about the foundations that build our team and our company.

title: Aapresid Congress: myths and truths about agricultural transformation
desc: Our Partner, David Wilson, was invited to participate in Aapresid's 2021 Congress. In this webinar, he discusses myths and truths about agricultural transformation.

title: The importance of 'contactability
desc: David Wilson, Partner at Ceibo Digital, explains how a correct Contactability helps to define a clear governance and automate the management of campaigns between the different departments.
